properties.NAME: BER Lounge Tempelhof
properties.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the Business Lounge Tempelhof! The BER Lounge Tempelhof impresses with spacious lounge areas and large panoramic windows with a view of the airport and the southern runway. Here you can enjoy your stay in a relaxed and exclusive atmosphere. Various lounge areas such as a relaxation area, working area, dining area and a fully equipped conference room offer space for all needs.  All gates are accessible from the lounge. Passport control is located directly in front of the lounge exit. You can gain access to the BER Lounge Tempelhof  by paying 48 EUR by EC or credit card on site by participating in a bonus program of one of our partners The conference room can be booked additionally for 100 EUR net per hour. Children under the age of 3 have free access to the lounge.   Please note our travel advice. Data protection Terms of use   We look forward to welcoming you! Book now

properties.NAME: NUUUORK
properties.DESCRIPTION: The hotspot for co-working and me-time at BER Airport. The Co-Working Lounge offers comfortable seats, rotating work and telephone bunks as well as a multimedia meeting room for video calls, live podcasts and interviews - of course with high-speed wifi, state-of-the-art technology and delicious drinks & snacks. The entire offer can be booked via the NUUUORK app; here you can also access the NUUUORK content. Prices from €12/hour.

properties.NAME: Planet Payment
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Digitale Platform für internationale Zahlungen & Rückerstattungen
Planet helps merchants in more than 70 countries improve their customer experience through digital payments.

properties.NAME: DentistSchönberg & Partner
properties.DESCRIPTION: The dental practice in the Berlin Brandenburg Airport Center (BBAC) offers a wide range of different dental services. These include aesthetic dentistry, orthodontics for adults and digital dentistry. Appointments can be made online.

properties.NAME: Regus Business Center
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Offices at the airport
Regus Business Center provides modern office space and offers co-working solutions at the Berlin Brandenburg Airport Center. As the world's largest provider of flexible workspace solutions, Regus offers a professional and inspiring work environment that can adapt to any business.

properties.NAME: Access to security control 5
properties.DESCRIPTION:
In Terminal 1 at security controls 1 and 5, families with children can use a special access to the security check area.

Basically, you can use any security checkpoint in T1 or T2. All departure gates are accessible from each security control. You will find information on waiting times on the website, in the app and on the monitors.

What is allowed in hand baggage, what is not? How can all passengers help to fasten the security checks? These and other information have been compiled here for you:

Well prepared through security controls

properties.NAME: beets&roots
properties.DESCRIPTION:
beets&roots was founded in Berlin in 2016 by a Michelin-starred chef and an enterprising entrepreneur. The inspiration? The lack of freshly prepared, healthy lunch options in Germany. The motivation? To become a go-to spot for delicious, seasonal and healthy food.
Born in Berlin, beets&roots embodies the open-minded, global mentality of our hometown. We're German, but with an international flair: from our culturally diverse team to our globally inspired dishes.

properties.NAME: Travelex ATM
properties.DESCRIPTION: You can withdraw euros, US dollars or British pounds from the Travelex ATM in the baggage claim area.

properties.NAME: Sparkasse
properties.DESCRIPTION: Withdraw cash around the clock – free of charge for all Sparkasse customers.

properties.NAME: Travelex ATM
properties.DESCRIPTION: At the Travelex ATM you can withdraw euros, US dollars or British pounds.

properties.NAME: Heinemann Duty Free & Travel Value
properties.DESCRIPTION:
First Class Shopping at Heinemann Duty Free with offers to take off
This store offers a journey for the senses: wine, spirits, perfume, delicacies, regional products and a large selection of tobacco.

properties.NAME: Last Call Bar
properties.DESCRIPTION: Cold & hot drinks, soft drinks, beer, wine, sparkling wine & spirits as well as small snacks.

properties.NAME: FALKE
properties.DESCRIPTION: Es sind die Details, durch die sich erstklassige Produkte von anderen unterscheiden. Seit 128 Jahren steht das Familienunternehmen FALKE für modische Bekleidung aus hochwertigen Materialien, verarbeitet mit handwerklicher Perfektion und der Liebe zum Detail. FALKE stellt moderne Bekleidungs-Accessoires her, die dem Lebensgefühl, der ganz persönlichen Kultur und den Ansprüchen jedes Einzelnen entsprechen sollen.

properties.NAME: Valet Parking
properties.DESCRIPTION: Relaxed parking with valet service directly at Terminal 1 Drop off your car right in front of Terminal 1 and let us take care of the rest. Your parking space is guaranteed and the valet service ensures maximum comfort. Simply book and travel relaxed.   Valet parking can only be booked online   Terminal 1: 1 minute's walk Terminal 2: 2 minute's walk Weight limit: 3.5t Get off at the terminal in the valet parking area, get on in car park P3 Additional services can be booked Service hours vehicle pick-up: 08:00 - 19:30 Service hours vehicle pick-up: 24/7 24 hours advance booking period Barrier-free

properties.NAME: BER Family Lane
properties.DESCRIPTION: In Terminal 1 at security controls 1 and 5, families with children can use a special access to the security check area. More information Basically, you can use any security checkpoint in T1 or T2. All departure gates are accessible from each security control. You will find information on waiting times on the website, in the app and on the monitors. What is allowed in hand baggage, what is not? How can all passengers help to fasten the security checks? These and other information have been compiled here for you: Well prepared through security controls

properties.NAME: Car park P1
properties.DESCRIPTION: Parking directly at Terminal 1 Book your guaranteed parking space right next to Terminal 1 now. Park your car comfortably in our car park, protected from the weather. Easy booking and quick access make your journey relaxed. Book online now   Terminal 1: 1 minute´s walk Terminal 2: 3 minutes´ walk Maximum entrance height: 2 m Weight limit: 3.3 t Weather protected Parking spaces for passengers with limited mobility Barrier-free  Sanitary facilities Baggage trolley Access to VIP Service Zeitgeist Premium Plus Parking – Secured Area

en.title: Parking Summer Special
en.subtitle: Now exclusively for you: Save over 60% at Car Park P1  – valid for stays of 7 days or more.

de.title: Parken Sommer Special
de.subtitle: Jetzt exklusiv für Sie: Über 60% sparen im Parkhaus P1 – gültig für Aufenthalte ab 7 Tagen.

properties.NAME: Burger King
properties.DESCRIPTION:
For every taste
Make your king, whether with beef, chicken or plant-based. Guests can choose from a wide variety of burgers, snacks, desserts & drinks.

properties.NAME: Ride App Pick up
properties.DESCRIPTION: At BER, there is a passenger pick-up zone called “Ride App Pick Up” for car hire partners of the transport providers Bolt, FREENOW and Uber. A separate area for users to get into the cars is located in the approach lane on arrival level E0.

properties.NAME: Mobility Service
properties.DESCRIPTION: Accessible travel Die Mitarbeiter des Mobility Service unterstützen Sie bei einer Mobilitätseinschränkung, mit oder ohne eigenen Rollstuhl, vom Check-in bis zum Boarding. Detailed information on barrier-free travel

properties.NAME: Global Blue
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Tax free refund services
We offer you a seamless Tax Free Shopping experience and pay your VAT, after you have got your customs validation. We offer Alipay, Wechat Pay, Credit Card and Cash and more.

properties.NAME: ACCESSORIZE
properties.DESCRIPTION: From fashionable jewellery and beautiful travel accessories to gifts for children and adults – Accessorize offers a wide range of the latest colours and seasonally appropriate items for beach holidays or city breaks. In addition to hats, bags and jewellery, travellers will also find swimwear in the latest colours, flip-flops, sunglasses and seasonal favourites.

properties.NAME: Starbucks
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Coffee – according to your taste and mood
Americano or caramel latte: Starbucks is now offering departing passengers a large selection of coffee specialities and snacks such as cakes, muffins and bagels in the food court of Terminal 1 at BER.

properties.NAME: Burger King
properties.DESCRIPTION:
For every taste
Whether Double Whopper or Veggie King: departing passengers can get their favourite burger from the American fast food chain Burger King in the food court of Terminal 1 at BER.

properties.NAME: Giant Trophy
properties.DESCRIPTION: The Giant Trophy of Euro 2024 visits BER: The trophy is almost 3.20 metres high and is located on the Market Place in the security area. A clock counts down the time until the first match on 14 June.

properties.NAME: RITUALS
properties.DESCRIPTION: Hand creams, body scrubs and refreshing fragrances for the journey: The new Rituals store in the BER Market Place offers departing passengers a wide range of skincare and cosmetics products, perfumes, make-up, sun protection and gift sets before their flight.

properties.NAME: Customs
properties.DESCRIPTION: Your contact for customs issues You can have your Global Blue Cheque stamped at customs for your VAT refund. Information on customs checks

properties.NAME: Workstation
properties.DESCRIPTION: Work areas directly at the gate The work areas are designed in bistro style, each with six workstations and various connections for charging electronic devices. Compatible devices can also be charged inductively. You are also welcome to use the free Wi-Fi _BER Airport Free Airport Wi-Fi.

properties.NAME: Workstation
properties.DESCRIPTION: Work areas directly at the gate The work areas are designed in bistro style, each with six workstations and various connections for charging electronic devices. Compatible devices can also be charged inductively. You are also welcome to use the free Wi-Fi _BER Airport Free Airport Wi-Fi.

properties.NAME: Workstation
properties.DESCRIPTION: Work areas directly at the gate The work areas are designed in bistro style, each with six workstations and various connections for charging electronic devices. Compatible devices can also be charged inductively. You are also welcome to use the free Wi-Fi _BER Airport Free Airport Wi-Fi.

properties.NAME: Bolt Drive
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Bolt Drive - always there for you
Small cars, electric cars, SUVs, vans - whatever you need a vehicle for, choose Bolt Drive!

properties.NAME: BER Biometrics at Fast Bag Drop
properties.DESCRIPTION: A further digital service is now available to passengers at BER. By way of BER Biometrics, BER Airport is offering all interested travellers from Terminal 1 the opportunity to navigate various departure stations using facial recognition and, therefore, without having to show their boarding pass. This includes printing baggage labels at selected self-service machines, use of the BER Runway with an extended time slot and access to the BER Tegel Lounge after prior booking. BER Biometrics is a voluntary and free service for interested passengers aged 16 and over. For the airport company, BER Biometrics is another building block towards a smart airport of the future. Find out more Download SmartDepart App (iOS) Download SmartDepart App (Android)

properties.NAME: BER Biometrics at Runway
properties.DESCRIPTION: The boarding pass can stay in your pocket A further digital service is now available to passengers at BER. By way of BER Biometrics, BER Airport is offering all interested travellers from Terminal 1 the opportunity to navigate various departure stations using facial recognition and, therefore, without having to show their boarding pass. This includes printing baggage labels at selected self-service machines, use of the BER Runway with an extended time slot and access to BER Lounges Tegel and Tempelhof after prior booking. BER Biometrics is a voluntary and free service for interested passengers aged 16 and over. For the airport company, BER Biometrics is another building block towards a smart airport of the future. Find out more Download SmartDepart App (iOS) Download SmartDepart App (Android)

properties.NAME: United Buddy Bears
properties.DESCRIPTION:
The “United Buddy Bears - THE MINIS” exhibition is currently on display at Berlin Brandenburg Airport. 100 colourful, cheerful Buddy Bears have found a new home for about two months on the arrivals level in the public area of Terminal 1.
The little bears symbolise freedom and international understanding: each bear represents a country around the globe and stands for the people and their culture, not political systems. Each figure was individually designed by an artist from the respective country. The one metre high bears stand - distributed over four areas - “Hand in hand” on small pedestals, symbolising the vision of a peaceful world.

properties.NAME: Drinking water dispensers
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Free bottled water 
You will find two water dispensers in Terminal 1 baggage claim near baggage carousels A3 and B3. These are located in the vestibules of the WC facilities and are freely accessible to everyone.

properties.NAME: Drinking water dispensers
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Free bottled water
You will find two water dispensers in Terminal 1 baggage claim near baggage carousels A3 and B3. These are located in the vestibules of the WC facilities and are freely accessible to everyone.

properties.NAME: Drinking water dispensers
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Free bottled water
You will find a water dispenser near the C3 baggage carousel in Terminal 2 baggage claim. This is located in the vestibule of the WC facility and is freely accessible to everyone.

properties.NAME: Kiez & Friends
properties.DESCRIPTION: Discover Kiez & Friends at BER - your hotspot for fresh pizza, crispy salads and more! Enjoy our delicious food on site or take advantage of our practical take-away offer. Fresh, delicious and always close to you - just like the Späti in your neighborhood.

en.title: 10% discount on the entire range
en.subtitle: 10% discount on everything in the Kiez & Friends range - strike now and save!

de.title: 10% Rabatt auf das gesamte Sortiment
de.subtitle: 10 % Rabatt auf alles im Sortiment bei Kiez & Friends – jetzt zuschlagen und sparen!

properties.NAME: Smoking area
properties.DESCRIPTION:
Designated area for smoking
Smoking is not permitted in the terminals. Please use the designated smoking areas outside.

properties.NAME: Berlin Coffee
properties.DESCRIPTION: Enjoy Berlin coffee specialities with a wide selection of sweet pastries, from Danish cinnamon buns to French éclairs. Berlin Coffee also offers a variety of savoury snacks, including handmade focaccia and paninis.

properties.NAME: Laggner Pizzatorio La Pizzaiola
properties.DESCRIPTION: Laggner Pizzatorio La Pizzaiola now offers all departing passengers freshly prepared pizza, panini, espresso, ice cream and more – right in Terminal 1 on Level E2 at Gate C04 (non-Schengen area, behind the security controls).
